metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1999023 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The Battle for Wesnoth Project version 1.7.0 through 1.14.3 contains a CodeInjection vulnerability in the Lua scripting engine that can result in codeexecution outside the sandbox. This attack appear to be exploitable viaLoading specially-crafted saved games, networked games, replays, and playercontent.

criterions.comment: wesnoth-1.12: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
